topics.body:
"@And Brother I Hurt People":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55ad2aa26368720229001d03#post_55ad2aa26368720229001d03
You know what would be a amazing movie?  A movie where a stoner becomes a vampire and doesn't realize it.
"Why don't you ever go outside?"
"It's fucking hot as balls outside!"
"Why don't you like garlic on pizza?"
"Pepperoni master race"
"Why don't you ever cross rivers?"
"I don't know how to swim"

"Man I'm freaking starving.  I have a severe craving for some munchies or something"

"Is it possible for a mirror to like stop working or something?"
"I told you not to smoke that shit all at once. . . How badly are you stone right now?"
"*I SMELL DORITOS! *runs right through a wall extremely fast to the kitchen*"
"Jesus christ!  Note to self: he's built like a tank so keep doritos in same room as him when he's stoned"

topics.body: What the hell? Maybe my game really *is* jacked. I was trying to break a psyche lock, and I was pretty confident a a particular person's profile was the key...and was shot down. I tried in vain for another twenty minutes before I had picked my inventory dry. So I caved and looked it up...and it turns out that the first thing I had presented was right. Tried it again, and for some reason, it worked (same question and everything, and this was just a psyche lock, not a court trial where timing and order can change the case). Sigh.
